inclusion.criterion: Patients with acute pain with conservative treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of signature of the informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: All physical and mental impairments which don´t allow the completion of the questionnaire or answering the interview

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
